item.title: Check npc hp 317
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“N3wc0d3r, post:3, topic:466621”][quote author=RandQm link=topic=583306.msg4154035#msg4154035 date=1352588771]

if (type == 3313) { if (Server.npcHandler.npcs[monster].HP <= 40) { if (!c.playerHasItem(2954)) { resetNpcAttack(); c.sM("Its burning hot, dowse it with water!"); return false; } else { c.setAnimation(453); c.sM("You pour water on it, and it melts!"); Server.npcHandler.npcs[monster].IsDead = true; } } }

You don’t need a loop at all, Server.npcHandler.npcs[monster].HP gives the hp of the indexed (monster) npc.
[/quote]

The part im confused is whether it’s giving the current hp of the npc youre attacking or if its giving the beginning hp of the npc (before the npc gets hurt).

edit: tested it, and it doesn’t stop me mid-combat even when the npcs hp is less than 40.[/quote]

Add a Time with a Check for the current N.P.C. Hitpoints.

Read full topic

You don’t need a loop at all, Server.npcHandler.npcs[monster].HP gives the hp of the indexed (monster) npc.[/quote]

edit: tested it, and it doesn’t stop me mid-combat even when the npcs hp is less than 40.

if (type == 3313) { if (Server.npcHandler.npcs[monster].HP <= 40) { if (!c.playerHasItem(2954)) { resetNpcAttack(); c.sM("Its burning hot, dowse it with water!"); return false; } else { c.setAnimation(453); c.sM("You pour water on it, and it melts!"); Server.npcHandler.npcs[monster].IsDead = true; } } }

You don’t need a loop at all, Server.npcHandler.npcs[monster].HP gives the hp of the indexed (monster) npc.

item.title: Check npc hp 317
item.dc:creator: @N3wc0d3r N3wc0d3r
item.description:
@N3wc0d3r wrote:

[Delta]

How would I make it so it would so when a npc hits a certain hitpoints, it would make the player stop attacking the npc until you had something in your inventory. Im not sure how loops work but this is what i got so far, it lags the server though when i attack the monster which makes me think it’s looping through all monsters instead of just the specific one.

if (type == 3313) {
	int monster = Server.npcHandler.npcs[c.attacknpc].npcId;
	for (int npcCurrentHealth = Server.npcHandler.npcs[110].HP; 
			npcCurrentHealth < 41; ++npcCurrentHealth) {
	if (npcCurrentHealth <= 40) {
		if (!c.playerHasItem(2954)) {
			resetNpcAttack();
			resetAttack();
			c.inCombat = false;
			c.sM("Its burning hot, dowse it with water!");
			return false;
		} else if (c.playerHasItem(2954)) {
			c.setAnimation(453);
			c.sM("You pour water on it, and it melts!");
			Server.npcHandler.npcs[monster].IsDead = true;
		}
		}
	}
}

thanks!

Read full topic
